## comments.CommentView.addSizeChangeListener() method

Registers a callback that listens for size changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addSizeChangeListener(listener: (oldSize: Size, newSize: Size) => void): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  listener | (oldSize: [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md)<!-- -->, newSize: [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | Receives callbacks when the size of the comment changes. The new and old size are in workspace units. |

void
